item.title: H.E.A.T. Index
item.description: What is H.E.A.T. ? Helldivers Environmental Advanced Training is a set of skill-based playstyles and roles revolving around our five main classes. These playstyles branch into extremely specialized roles with high potential for synergistic combinations.

item.title: H.E.A.T. Resources
item.description: Challenges for HEAT HEAT Certification Rules H.E.A.T. Certification Request Template **Callsign:**[Ping Yourself] **Certification Requested: **[Tier + Class] **Availability:** [Time] Reason for seeking training: [Give us some lore; bring a little RP into here] Remember to Ping yourself The availability time should be formatted in UTC +2 or using Discord date picker .

item.title: 1 Loadouts Types
item.description: Hello Divers! This is Loadouts explained. This document will show you what types of weapons there are and in Part 2 will show you how to make a proper loadout.

item.title: 2 Loadout Creation
item.description: DISCLAIMER: PLEASE READ hth-1-loadout-types BEFORE READING THIS DOCUMENT Hello Divers! This is Loadouts, explained. This document will show you how you can use the several types of weaponry within our arsenal to make a Jack-of-all-Trades loadout or a specialised one! Loadout Creation - Basics Depending on which enemies youâ€™re facing, each type of weapon may be prioritised over others.

item.title: Rank Responsibilities
item.description: Cadet your only responsibility is to make sure to get your first training as fast as possible so you can be placed in a Squad and to become a Private Private you don't really have ...

item.title: Departure Course
item.description: This will be a short course or Reminder on how to create and manage Departure Notices. If you have any Questions after this please feel free to message your Commanding Officer and if they are not reachable the Person above them.
